==== Items carried on ====

** ''ACTION:'' bluesabre to create a basic user-profile-image app

==== Team updates ====
The discussion about "Team updates" started at 15:08.

** skellat prepared an SRU bug for the revised documentation for 12.04
** Desktop of the week will choose and propose the first desktop for tomorrow, we hope it gets its proper place in the main site and social networks
** adding in the ability for the installation slideshow to automatically use the version number, and soon the version name
** Unit193 and GridCube both made waves in media relative to the experimental XMir image
** 12.04.3 is next week...
** skellat will be presenting UbuCon at Ohio Linux Fest 2013 and intends to represent Xubuntu whilst there
** ''ACTION:'' : GridCube to inform the desktop of the week team that the site will be ready next week, we should prepare a few options for the upcoming weeks
** ''ACTION:'' knome to make sure the docs hit the 12.04.3 SRU
** ''ACTION:'' micahg to upload docs SRU
